description:
*Available in: English*

New in 1.0.3: 
- New info for the Sun
- New info for the 8 planets
- New info for Pluto
- Scrolling added to menu screen
- Gallery made portrait only

Do you like space? Do you want your kids to learn some cool facts about our solar system? Well look no further! This app gives you some information on our very own star, the Sun, the 8 planets, the former planet Pluto, the Asteroid belt, the Kuiper belt, the Oort Cloud, & a picture gallery! Great to pick up and read some facts or look at pictures of our solar system when you're bored or have time to waste.

Check out our other apps:
- Aquarium
- Fireplace
- Beach
- American Flag
- Rick Roll
- It's a Trap!
- Metal Gear Solid Soundboard
- Objection!
